Injector/Double Punch/Manterror:


The three Predacons stopped 60 ft from the Predacon base.

(if Cyber Claw followed Injector)

"This is the Pred base.  You can go in and ask Hell Beast where Megatron is." 
Injector said, Double Punch suddenly appearing next to him as he deactivated 
his cloaking device.

"Come, let's get inside.  Those of us who need repairs will get them." he 
ordered, the three Preds heading for the Predacon base.
